wikipedia_page.main:
James Rigby is Chief Executive of SCC, Rigby Group's IT services business.Rigby joined SCC in 1997 in the Engineering Services division, and was appointed to run the Technology Sourcing division in 1995. Subsequently, he was made General Manager and has taken on responsibility for service delivery operations across Europe and playing a major role in all Group acquisitions.
He now heads SCC's operations in the UK, France, Spain, Romania and the Netherlands.

response: His sons, James Rigby (SCC CEO) and Steven Rigby (European GM) are both directors on the board of Rigby Group, while Peter Rigby is chairman and group CEO.
